Hi! How to make new friends?

Start by being open and friendly. Smile and say hello to people you meet. Join clubs or groups that interest you. This way, you meet people who like the same things. Be a good listener and show interest in others. Ask questions about them. Be patient; friendships take time to grow.
Thank you! Any tips for keeping friends?

Sure! Stay in touch regularly. Send a message or call to check in. Be supportive and listen when they need to talk. Share fun activities together. Be honest and kind. Respect their space and time. Show appreciation for their friendship. Little gestures, like remembering their birthday, can mean a lot.
Great advice! What if we have a fight?

It's normal to have disagreements. Stay calm and talk about the problem. Listen to their side and share your feelings too. Apologize if you're wrong and be willing to forgive. Find a solution together. Remember, a strong friendship can grow from working through problems.
